document.full_text: a pennsylvania man was sentenced to one year in prison on thursday for his role in the burning of a cross outside the house of an african-american foster child, authorities said.
document.title: man gets prison term for pennsylvania cross burning
lines_and_colors: a pennsylvania man was sentenced to one year in prison on thursday for his role in the burning of a cross outside the house of an african-american foster child, authorities said.
